source:
TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_1Hello there, and welcome to the Botanists' Guild. What brings you here today?
...Hm? Interested in becoming a botanist, are you?
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_1<tab>Bienvenue au Courtil, voyage<var 08 E905 ((use)) ((ur)) /var>. Vous vous intéressez à la botanique<var 1D /var>? Si c'est le cas, je ne peux que vous conseiller de venir dans notre guilde.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_2<tab>Then you've come to the right place. At our guild, you can study under some of the finest botanists in all the realm. An enticing proposition, is it not?
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_2<tab>En rejoignant notre communauté, vous pourrez apprendre auprès de grands spé<var 16 /var>cia<var 16 /var>listes, à commencer par notre maître Fufucha.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_3<tab>So, what say you? Would you like to add your name to our roll?
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_3<tab>Vous pourrez aussi découvrir des tas de choses sur la nature et son environnement, ce qui pourra vous être utile lors de vos aventures. Alors, qu'en dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_Q1_000_1<tab>Do you wish to join the Botanists' Guild?
TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_10<tab>Oh... Well, that's a shame. I'm sure you'd find botany a singularly rewarding pursuit. I know I do.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_10<tab>Je vois, c'est dommage. La botanique est un art ancien à Gridania, il y a beaucoup de choses à apprendre ici.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_11<tab>If you ever have a change of heart, feel free to return here. The guild is ever looking to welcome new members into its ranks.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_11<tab>Revenez me voir si vous changez d'avis.
TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_20<tab>Bien<var 1D /var>! Dans ce cas je vais... Attendez un instant. Je regrette, mais je pense qu'il est encore trop tôt pour vous.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_21<tab>...Is what I would say if you were a suitable candidate. Alas, my instincts tell me you've only just started out as an adventurer. You don't lack for enthusiasm, I'll give you that, but you're still as green as spring grass. Come back when you've seen a bit more of the world, will you?
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_21<tab>Je vais vous demander d'étudier de manière un peu plus approfondie votre discipline actuelle et de revenir me voir plus tard.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_SYSTEM_000_22<tab>Before you can take up another discipline, you must first complete the level 10 quest of your starting class.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_SYSTEM_000_22<tab>Il est nécessaire d'avoir terminé la quête de classe de niveau 10 dans votre classe de départ pour étudier les disciplines des autres classes.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_30<tab>Excellent! Now, you're doubtless eager to dive headlong into the nearest shrubbery─but first, a brief explanation on the origins of the Botanists' Guild.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_30<tab>Très bien<var 1D /var>! Dans ce cas, permettez-moi de commencer par vous présenter l'histoire de notre association.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_31<tab>Our guild boasts a long history. Its roots can be traced back some five hundred years, to when our nation was still in its infancy. It was around that time that a precursor organization to our own was established to facilitate communion with the elementals...
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_31<tab>D'après nos archives, les origines de notre guilde remontent à plus de cinq cents ans. Il existait déjà une or<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion de botanistes à l'époque de la fondation de notre cité.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_32<tab>Ah...but I suspect you're already confused, not being forestborn. Let me put it in a way that your kind would understand.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_32<tab>La raison est que le principe fondamental de la botanique gridanienne, qui est de bénéficier des dons de la Sylve des Douze, est étroitement lié à nos échanges avec les esprits.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_33<tab>The Twelveswood doesn't belong to man, but almighty beings known as elementals. It is by their leave that we Gridanians dwell here in the forest, and it is by their leave that we receive of its bounty.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_33<tab>Vous devez sans doute vous demander ce que ce charabia veut dire...

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_34<tab>Ever since mankind settled in the Twelveswood, it has been necessary for us to obtain the elementals' permission prior to taking aught from their domain. Historically, this was a rather involved process in that only a precious few could actually commune with them─specifically, those conjurers blessed with the ability to hear the elementals, aptly known as Hearers.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_34<tab>Pour faire simple, la forêt qui nous abrite et nous nourrit n'appartient pas aux hommes mais aux esprits. Pour pouvoir bénéficier de tout ce qu'elle a à nous offrir, nous avons d'abord dû obtenir la permission de ces êtres.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_35<tab>In order to relay the elementals' will to the botanists in a more timely manner, a new organization was formed with a Hearer as its mouth and ears. This organization would eventually evolve to become the Botanists' Guild.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_35<tab>Seuls les druides ont le pouvoir de communiquer avec les esprits. Pour transmettre les directives des esprits aux botanistes, une or<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>ni<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion s'est na<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>rel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment formée<var 1D /var>: c'est l'ancêtre de cette guilde.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_36<tab>To this day, the guild employs the services of a Hearer who offers guidance to our members. Yet this is no longer our organization's sole concern. We also seek to promulgate correct harvesting practices─that is, practices which honor the will of the elementals.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_36<tab>Cette vocation n'a d'ailleurs pas disparu, mais de nos jours, la guilde met aussi l'accent sur l'en<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ment des techniques et des savoirs concernant la récolte.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_37<tab>...And that, my friend, is the story of how our guild came to be. I trust you have a newfound appreciation for the work we do.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_37<tab>Voilà, vous avez une meilleure idée de notre raison d'être, à présent.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_38<tab>Now, with all this talk of elementals and communing, mayhap you're wondering whether you're fit to join us. Well, you may cast such doubts aside. You don't need to have been raised as a good little forestborn <var 08 E905 ((girl)) ((boy)) /var> to be a botanist, nor do you need to know the secret forestborn salute─<var 1A 02 /var>I jest<var 1A 01 /var>─you just need a healthy respect for nature and the will to learn.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_38<tab>Maintenant, parlons un peu de vous. La chose essentielle que nous demandons à nos recrues c'est de toujours travailler dans le respect de la nature.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_39<tab>If you honestly believe you possess these things, it would be my pleasure to recommend you to our guildmaster.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_39<tab>Si vous êtes décidé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à entrer dans notre guilde et apprendre la botanique, alors vous devrez d'abord <var 1A 02 /var>lui<var 1A 01 /var> prouver votre sincérité et votre détermination.

source: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_40<tab>Please wait a moment while I see to the formalities. Speak to me again when you are ready to begin the enrollment procedures.
target: TEXT_CLSHRV999_00193_LEONCEAULT_000_40<tab>Donnez-moi quelques secondes pour préparer les formalités d'inscription.
